verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it from <S%H72>Ebenezer<s%> to <S%H795>Ashdod.<s%>

Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> it by <S%H1712>Dagon.<s%>

When the <S%H796>Ashdodites<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> had <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> So they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> and <S%H7725>set<s%> him in his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

But when they <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> had <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> And the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> [were] <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> on the <S%H4670>threshold;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> the trunk of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> to him.

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of Dagon in <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Now the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on the <S%H796>Ashdodites,<s%> and He <S%H8074>ravaged<s%> them and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with <S%H9425>tumors,<s%> both <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and its <S%H1366>territories.<s%>

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H3651>so,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> must not <S%H3427>remain<s%> with us, for His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7185>severe<s%> on us and on <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> our <S%H430>god.<s%>"

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> to them and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H5437>brought<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>" And they <S%H5437>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [around.]

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H5437>brought<s%> it <S%H5437>around,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was against the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>confusion;<s%> and He <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H9512>young<s%> and <S%H1419>old,<s%> so that <S%H9425>tumors<s%> <S%H8368>broke<s%> out on them.

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron.<s%> And it <S%H1961>happened<s%> as the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> that the <S%H6139>Ekronites<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> out, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "They have <S%H5437>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> to us, to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us and our <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> therefore and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>"Send<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and let it <S%H7725>return<s%> to its own <S%H4725>place,<s%> that it may not <S%H4191>kill<s%> us and our <S%H5971>people.<s%>" For there was a <S%H4194>deadly<s%> <S%H4103>confusion<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> did not <S%H4191>die<s%> were <S%H5221>smitten<s%> with <S%H9425>tumors<s%> and the <S%H7775>cry<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
